locations.name: Hanoi
locations.description: Vietnam's vibrant capital city, known for its historic Old Quarter, Hoan Kiem Lake, and French colonial architecture mixed with Vietnamese traditions.

locations.name: Hoi An
locations.description: A charming UNESCO World Heritage ancient town in Central Vietnam, famous for its well-preserved architecture, colourful lanterns, and riverside setting.

locations.name: Con Dao Islands
locations.description: A remote archipelago and national park off the southern coast, offering pristine beaches, clear waters, coral reefs, and a tranquil, off-the-beaten-path atmosphere.
